name: Penny Time
description:
“a brilliant blend of endless-runner, rhythm-action, and platformer.” PocketGamer [Gold]
“effortless style and mesmerizing soundtrack...” IGN Wireless: Features
"The knife-edge tension of a perfect run is what keeps you coming back..." Eurogamer : App of the day
"it is simply awesome! Who knew such a thing was even possible?" Appolicious
"a ridiculous, ageless thing that can be enjoyed by anyone." Touch Arcade

Penny Time is a side-scrolling action game where you’ll ride the original plastic skateboard in search of points, multipliers, tricks and secrets!

Set in a post-retro game world not too far removed from suburbia, the player soon discovers that their Penny board has the ability to freeze time. You’ll ollie, hippy jump and power-slide your way under, through and over frozen obstacles to victory, and choose whether you cash in your earnings along the way or risk it all by playing increasingly difficult areas for even greater points. Each of the game’s unique levels feature two gameplay modes which will immerse and challenge both casual and experienced players alike.

FEATURES
- Mesmerising soundtrack created by Hunz (Purchase | hunz.bandcamp.com)
- Shred your way through five unique and challenging levels.
- Fully colour-customisable Penny skateboard
- Skate in search of points, multipliers, tricks and secrets
- Cash in your earnings or risk them for more
- More planned FREE downloadable content. inc characters, accessories and new modes.
- More upcoming competition play.
- 80+ achievements to discover and unlock.
